Why Hire Us?

 Feb 27, 2018

Feb 27, 2018

Looking to buy or sell in South Florida? As owners of a well-known boutique brokerage with an amazing team, we’re ready to make your move a reality! Call us at 305.248.1488 or message us on Facebook. If you’re in the market to buy, you can search every home for sale on the MLS just like we do. Or, if you need to sell, we can let you know what your home could sell for with an instant home valuation report. Let us share our real estate and South Florida lifestyle experience with you. We pride ourselves on negotiating real results. Like us on Facebook for a sneak-peak into our newest listings.


Traci and Julie, The RealtyGirls

    • About Traci Cope Tam & Julie Frederick


    Julie Frederick and Traci Cope Tam are best known as the RealtyGirls from Global Realty Services.  It is their belief that today’s real estate market demands a team approach. Julie and Traci have proven that their individual skills come together to offer their customers the benefit of twice the knowledge and experience; not to mention, a commitment to exceeding their customer’s real estate goals.  When you entrust the RealtyGirls with the listing of your property, their number one goal is to get it sold for you timely and for top dollar. Their partnership is founded on the highest levels of honesty and integrity, a caring attitude, and the sincere desire to provide their customers quality real estate services in the community they live in. Not just Realtors… Licensed Real Estate Brokers and the owners of Global Realty Services.
